description:
On build we get a message from child cells where instance['info_cache']['network_info'] is []... and not json-ified.  We need to json-ify this before passing to the DB method.

This traceback is for internal mysqldb code, but would likely be some sort of problem against sqlalchemy also.

332407:2013-10-15 15:11:01.336 17434 ERROR nova.cells.messaging [req-32f45513-ca61-4f37-b1a8-eeeb6f5100f3 10085925 5853594] Error processing message locally: (1064, "You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near '), `updated_at` = '2013-10-15 15:11:01.334702' WHERE `instance_uuid`='8da76d19-b' at line 1")

title: cells traceback on every build

comments.content:
On build we get a message from child cells where instance['info_cache']['network_info'] is []... and not json-ified.  We need to json-ify this before passing to the DB method.

This traceback is for internal mysqldb code, but would likely be some sort of problem against sqlalchemy also.

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/52231
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/52231
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/509bd157d3afc11ccda2a3a53fc3770cee2da3f6
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 509bd157d3afc11ccda2a3a53fc3770cee2da3f6
Author: Chris Behrens <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Oct 16 22:13:29 2013 +0000

    Make cells info_cache updates more tolerant
    
    Allow lists or network models to be passed in for
    instance['info_cache']['network_info'] in cells updates.  Ultimately
    these messages will become more consistent when fully converted to objects.
    
    Change-Id: Ifd46a3060418b3e2e4073c3b232937a18a225f99
    Closes-bug: 1240730
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
